title: Kingemmanuel
author: Kingemmanuel
content: Sapphire — the first and only confidential EVM for the web3 industry — allows for:⁠⁠🔵 Confidential state, end-to-end encryption, & confidential randomness⁠⁠🔵 99% EVM compatibility⁠⁠🔵 Easy integration with EVM-based dApps, such as NFT, Metaverse, crypto gaming and DeFi⁠⁠🔵 Scalability — increased throughput of transactions⁠⁠🔵 Low-cost — 99%+ lower fees than Ethereum⁠⁠🔵 Cross-chain bridge to enable cross-chain interoperability (upcoming)⁠⁠Learn more about Sapphire at the link in our bio
